data.name: AI Led Personalization - Delivering Customer Delight at Scale even during COVID-19 crisis
data.summary: The marketing playbook - as you know it - is undergoing a paradigm shift. The ongoing COVID-19 crisis will re-shape industries, competitive landscapes, consumer behaviour, and marketing budgets. Set in this backdrop, we at Netcore, want to continue to empower you.
data.speakers:
Nakul Jayatsen, Product Manager, Netcore
Niranjan Sane, Tata CliQ
Ashish Bajaj, Head of Marketing, DocsApp
Duc Pham, Head of Marketing, sendo.vn
Sushil Tripath, Apparel Group
